Reviews.Title: Samsung Behold 2-Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Beholder
Reviews.Content: Samsung Behold 2 SGH-T939 Android Smartphone For T-Mobile Wireless Network with No Contract - Good Condition - 30 Day Seller's Warranty (Brown)This is a great phone.  Does everything we need it to do and more.  Great picture quality, easy to access internet.  Have had it for 2 months now and we are not disappointed at all.  If you are looking for a smart phone, definetly look at this one. We are glad we did.

Reviews.Title: Worst phone I've had in a while
Reviews.Author: Jody Wire
Reviews.Content: I had to buy a replacement for my broken Galaxy Blaze and after reviewing all the ratings for the Behold, I thought I made a good choice. I was wrong. Stuck with crappy app store that can't even perform a search; touch screen is crap-good luck in selecting a 1 or letter a. I should have paid to get my Blaze's screen repaired. Live and learn.

ProductInfo.Features:
Pre-Owned Device Ready For Activation On T-Mobile Wireless Network, Free Of Contract
Brilliant widescreen AMOLED display with a virtual QWERTY keyboard and "3D Cube Menu" navigation for one-touch access to applications
Built-in 5.0-megapixel camera and camcorder with auto-focus, flash and 8x zoom. Wi-Fi technology, Corporate email and more
Full integration with Google applications such as Google Maps, Gmail, YouTube, Google Calendar and Google Talk
Offer Includes - Samsung Behold 2 SGH-T939 Android Smartphone (Minor Scratches and/or Blemishes), Battery, and Wall Charger
